name: Flight of Light
description: Rhythm-racing - Fly through fantastical worlds, or race your friends in time to the music!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 5850 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 5850 Storage: 1500 MB available space
